title: Creating table with IDAPython
content:
I'd like to create the table like below, I could not found any clue while googling it. Is it possible to make table with 
IDAPython
, especially with 
idaapi.simplecustviewer_t
class? Any advises would be helpful for me. Thanks.

answers_data.content: These table/list views are called “choosers” in IDA, so look for that keyword in the samples.
